name: payrox-go-beyond
description: A comprehensive blockchain deployment and orchestration framework

scripts.test:comprehensive: npm run test:facet-size && npm run test:orchestrator && npm run test:enhanced && npm run test:route-proof
scripts.test:enhanced: hardhat test test/orchestrator-comprehensive.spec.ts && hardhat test test/manifest-utils-enhanced.spec.ts
scripts.test:acceptance: npm run test:facet-size && npm run test:orchestrator && npm run test:route-proof
scripts.deploy:testnet: npm run pre-deploy:testnet && hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run pre-deploy:mainnet && hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:ecosystem: hardhat run scripts/deploy-complete-ecosystem.ts --network localhost && npm run contracts:bundle
scripts.contracts:update: npm run compile && npm run contracts:bundle
scripts.contracts:fix: npm run contracts:sync && npm run verify:mapping
scripts.contracts:abi-sync: npm run compile && npm run contracts:bundle && npm run verify:abi
scripts.web:setup: npm run contracts:bundle && npm run web:test
scripts.cleanup:safe: echo 'Review cleanup-repository.js before running' && node cleanup-repository.js
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run test:comprehensive && npm run coverage && npm run size
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run sbom
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run coverage && npm run sbom
scripts.deploy: npm run pre-deploy && hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts

author: PayRox Team
